title: Change VAF information in config from list to dict
body:
In config.yaml the VAF information is currently a list:
```
vaf-field: # needs to be checked with bcftools view -h
      - FORMAT
      - AF
```

A dict with name:xxx and type:xxx would be better.

title: Report FP / FN negative variants in single table
body: To improve variant calling workflows, having a look at FP or FN called variants can be helpful. At the moment, these variants are reported in tables that are stratified. Having a step to unifiy these tables per callset would be nice.

title: P-value sorting happens only per chromosome not globally
body:
During collection of fp and fn the p value sorting only happens per chromosome and not globally:

https://github.com/snakemake-workflows/dna-seq-benchmark/blob/f04e754ce492d84fa3254ddc6577f627522f9e38/workflow/scripts/collect-fp-fn.py#L146

title: `grch37: false` can only be set once while `grch37: true` can be set per callset
body:
The flag `grch37` is used to define the reference genome used during variant calling in the config. 

Expected behavior: Define the reference genome per callset and consequently use the correct `rename-contigs` contigs file (grch37_ucsc2ensembl or grch38_ucsc2ensembl).

Current behavior: For specific callsets `grch37: true` can be defined but setting `grch37: false` per callset does not work. The file for rename contigs has to be set manually.

title: Somatic Benchmark: Calculate VAF for callers that do not report VAF
body:
The Variant Allele Frequency can be calculated. Some callers do not report the VAF. Implement the calculation to enable stratification for those results.

https://github.com/Illumina/strelka/issues/128

title: Allow the user to specific their own truth VCF file
body: The benchmark workflow can then also be used to compare the results of multiple pipelines with each other.

title: Can only run either WGS or WES/FFPE callsets
body: lc and hc callsets lead to error in rule `stratify_results` originating from `get_collect_fp_fn_callsets`
